title: Earth: An Introduction to Physical Geology 11th Tarbuck c2014
description:
Earth: An Introduction to Physical Geology, 11th Edition (c2014), a textbook authored by Edward J. Tarbuck and Frederick K. Lutgens, and illustrated by Dennis Tasa.

TEXTBOOK INFO: <a href=" http://www.pearsonhighered.com/pearsonhigheredus/educator/product/products_detail.page?isbn=9780321814067" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.pearsonhighered.com/pearsonhigheredus/educator/product/products_detail.page?isbn=9780321814067</a>
